entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
